titleStmt.title: Truth brought to light, or, The corrupt practices of some persons at court laid open whereby Their Majesties and the kingdom have been prejudiced near one hundred and fifty thousand pounds this year; besides other evils that have and do attend it.
titleStmt.author: Crosfeild, Robert.

titleStmt.title: Truth brought to light, or, The corrupt practices of some persons at court laid open whereby Their Majesties and the kingdom have been prejudiced near one hundred and fifty thousand pounds this year; besides other evils that have and do attend it.
titleStmt.author: Crosfeild, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Crosfeild by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"Proposals for an act of tunnage," pp. 17-23.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
